trans-unit.source: Configures the security settings of a <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> 繫結的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message-level security settings for a <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> 繫結的訊息層級安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity" />, which represents the message-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity" />，代表此繫結的訊息層級安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: The default security settings are: a <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity.ClientCredentialType%2A> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageCredentialType.UserName>; and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity.AlgorithmSuite%2A> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設安全性設定是：<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity.ClientCredentialType%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageCredentialType.UserName>的<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageSecurity.AlgorithmSuite%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256%2A>，以及 的 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security mode for a <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> 繫結的安全性模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurityMode.None" />.
The value of this property affects which settings in <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Message%2A> become effective.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Message%2A> 中的設定變為有效時，此屬性的值就會產生影響。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a legal value for <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurityMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurityMode" /> 的合法值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a message element should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 判斷訊息項目是否應該序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the transport element should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 判斷傳輸項目是否應該序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the transport element should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳輸項目應該序列化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport-level security settings for a <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> 繫結的傳輸層級安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: The transport-level security settings for a <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="basicHttpBinding" /> 繫結的傳輸層級安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property contains properties that control authentication parameters for the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: 本屬性傳回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> 物件包含了控制 HTTP 傳輸之驗證參數的屬性。
